response.content:
Here is a recipe for a delicious chocolate cake for 8 people:

```
{
  "step1": "Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease two 8-inch round cake pans and line bottoms with parchment paper. This ensures easy cake release.",
  "step2": "Mix 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1 teaspoon salt in a medium bowl. Whisk to combine dry ingredients.",
  "step3": "In a large mixing bowl, combine 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder and 1 cup whole milk. Add 2 large eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. Whisk until smooth and well combined.",
  "step4": "Add dry ingredients to chocolate mixture and whisk until just combined. Do not overmix. Ensure a smooth batter for even cake texture.",
  "step5": "Divide batter evenly between prepared pans and smooth tops. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Check for doneness.",
  "step6": "Let cakes cool in pans for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Once cool, frost and decorate as desired with chocolate frosting and toppings."
}
```
